title: IT Cosmetics Founder on New Book
itunes:title: IT Cosmetics Founder on New Book
description:
IT Cosmetics Founder Jamie Kern Lima discusses her new book “Believe It: How to Go from Underestimated to Unstoppable.”

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
